articles.title: All Blacks great Jerome Kaino in European Champions Cup final with Toulouse - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Ex-All Blacks enforcer still going strong at 38 as Toulouse make first Euro final in 11 years.
articles.content:
Jerome Kainos stellar career continues at 38 with the former All Blacks star helping French club Toulouse make the European Champions Cup final.

articles.author: Bill McLoughlin
articles.title: Britons vow to boycott EU as companies threaten to abandon UK in Brexit revenge plot - Express
articles.description: BRITONS have vowed to boycott EU products following the latest threats from European companies to leave the UK in a bitter plot to exploit Britain.

articles.title: Toulouse await either Leinster or La Rochelle in the Champions Cup final - The42
articles.description: The French side will be out to earn their fifth European crown in the decider at Twickenham.
articles.content:
Toulouse 21
Bordeaux 9
TOULOUSE EARNED THEIR place in the Heineken Champions Cup final with a 21-9 victory at home against fellow Top 14 side Bordeaux.
